articles.description: J.Lo opened up about postponing her wedding to Alex Rodriguez due to the coronavirus pandemic, during a chat with Hoda Kotb on the ‘Today’ show Tuesday.

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Silent Hill DLC for Dead by Daylight includes Pyramid Head killer, Cheryl Mason survivor - Polygon
articles.description: Silent Hill’s Pyramid Head and Cheryl Mason are joining the Dead by Daylight roster in a new chapter for Behaviour Interactive’s multiplayer horror game. Dead by Daylight: Silent Hill is live now in beta, and coming to PS4, Xbox One, Switch and PC in June.
articles.content: A new killer, a new survivor, and Silent Hills elementary school are coming to Dead by Daylights next chapter

articles.title: Dark season 3 trailer reveals release date, time travel in ‘a new world’ - Polygon
articles.description: The first trailer for Netflix’s third and final cycle of Dark teases how Netflix’s twist-filled time-travel show will end when it’s released on June 26. Let us explain what you’re seeing here.
